data.name: Blacksmith Legends: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
Check full version of the game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430750/Blacksmith_Legends/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1349300/Yakuza_Empire/

Blacksmith Legends: Prologue is a first chapter of the upcoming RPG simulation strategy game. You inherit a small workshop from your parents with a dream to become real legend in your profession. With all your family fortune, you set out to create best items you ever imagined and develop your village/cities, workshop, hire other professions to tinker with your recipes, create opportunities by completing various quests that can get you on darker(mischievous) or lighter(righteous) path on your way of creating best blacksmith craftsmanship in the Kingdom!


Customize recipes for each worker to utilize your own way of becoming a legend.


Manage ě different hand-crafted professions: Blacksmith and Smelter. Their cooperation will be required to achieve best items.


Precious materials are hard to come by! Be prepared to face epic creatures or savage bandits.


Prologue will offer few magical/rare items to craft or loot from powerful bosses! Equip them on your heroes.
data.about_the_game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1349300/Yakuza_Empire/

data.short_description: Blacksmith Legends: Prologue is a first chapter of the upcoming game. Your job is to craft/modify your recipes, manage your workshop/employees and protect your craftsmanship against various dangers that can happen in the Kingdom!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10 - 64bit.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10 - 64bit.
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
